dictionary.desc: [SCENE DESCRIPTION | MESSAGE FROM MURDERER] Few minutes after sending a message
dictionary.scene:
Et tu, Brute?
MjM=[+]NTQzMg==[-]NTAwMA==[-]NDMw[-]MTg==
Max wbx bl vtlm
dictionary.goodcode: After few seconds you get an reply message!
dictionary.acmds: Available commands: encrypt [key] [message] - encrypting given message sms [message] - send sms with code
dictionary.done: Congratulations! You have passed to next level
dictionary.dle: All good! Run stage3.exe to continue adventure!
